title: Lee Sin, how do you navigate seas?
body:
After seeing Lee Sin just stand there, for hours, Pirate Ryze grew curious.

{{champion:13}} Lee Sin, what do you do here?

{{champion:64}} I navigate the seas, and this ship, why?

{{champion:13}} But you're blind.

{{champion:64}} I'm only blind visually.

{{champion:13}} That doesn't even make sense. If you can navigate ships, then where are we now?

{{champion:64}} We're on the deck of ship, and below us is the galley.

{{champion:13}} That doesn't count as navigating, I thought you said you can navigate ships.

{{champion:64}}  I do navigate ships, I navigate the inside of them.

{{champion:13}} Well, lets if you can navigate where we're at OUTSIDE of the ship. Where are we in the sea?

{{champion:64}} We're somewhere around 1033 feet above the sea floor.
